Message.Msg: My peripheral trading system generated following trade signal before close today: “Exit CASH to Short AMZN at market close on 3/11/2013" “Exit Long AMZN to hold CASH at market open on 3/11/2013" Alert performance so far (since Feb 4th, 2013): -2.5%. The signal was generated before the trade time indicated in the alert statement. The signals can show up (rarely) before regular market open, (rarely) during regular trading hours, or (mostly) before regular market close.
I posted the results after extended trading was closed, for informational purposes only. It is recommended to stay Cash on earnings release dates.
